body:
Day 60 - 1451*
I have arrived. Sorry for the wait. Now,.I gotta ask something, do the authors of these old hentais feel pride while looking at them? Or are they something that they can't just erase form the internet now? Either way, I would not be able to look at them and feel the need to show them to anyone else.
1/10.
That was actually good but there was no story
